roleset.name: to have as a logical consequence
roleset.note: ENTAIL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'entail' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from entail.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The paper gave no details of what the restrictions would entail [*T*-1] but said [0]the measures were necessary [*] to protect the domestic market .
